SA20n1303:2: 1 | ekasminsamaye bhagavānpurā viharati smaveṇuvane kalandakanivāpe mahatā [bhikṣu] saṃghena sārddhamaprameyeṇa |
SA20n1303:5: sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ śūnyā niḥsārā aśraddheyāḥ sarvalokaiḥ |
SA20n1303:8: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāvijñānaṃ na bandho na mokṣaḥ |
SA20n1303:9: rūpalakṣaṇaṃ tyajati ca lakṣaṇam vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānanyalakṣaṇāni tyajanti ca kṣaṇāni |
SA20n1303:11: na te grāhyā nopekṣyā na samalā na vimalā jagatā nānugatā na pratigatā nābhākharā na bhākharā na moho na prajñā na caipo'nto na so'nta nāpi ca madhyasrota iticocyate na bandhaḥ ||
SA20n1303:17: śūnyatāyāṃna kuśakaṃ na cā kuśalaṃ na cāpi śūnyalakṣaṇamityucyate śūnyam |
SA20n1303:18: bodhisattvo yadyevaṃ jānāti skandhadhātvāyatanasvabhāvaṃ na cagṛhṇātītyucyate dharmakṣāntiḥ |
SA20n1303:21: atīteṣvaprameyeṣu kalpeṣu parinirvṛteṣu buddhadharmeṣu puruṣo dharmaṃ gaveṣayanna kicidapi paśyati na ca śrṛṇoti sattvā viparivartante kurvanto'prameyāṇyakuśalāni |
SA20n1303:22: punaranyataḥ pariśuddhaprajñajanāḥ karuṇāyante satveṣu gaveṣayanti buddhadharmāngatvā paśyantyākāśe likhitāni lekhaspaṣṭatayāvagacchanti vācayanti gṛhnanti dhārayanti yathābhāṣitamācaranti vibhajya prakāśayantyupakurvanti sattvān |
SA20n1303:23: yaśca likhatyākāśe yaśca jānātyākāśākṣarāṇi sa nu cintayituṃ śakyo yaśca vā prakāśayati deśayatyācarati gṛhṇāti dhārayati nayāte sattvānvimocayati vandham ||
SA20n1303:26: sarveṣāṃ kāle'hamāsaṃ cakravarta sarve cārāgitāstepūjitāste buddhāśca buddhaputrāśca prāptavyahetorna ca mayā prāptaṃ vyākaraṇam |
SA20n1303:29: punaḥ khalu labdhāni dvāpaṣṭibuddhaśatasahasrāṇi ekaṣapṭayuttaradvādaśabuddhaśatāni ca |
SA20n1303:32: parinirvṛteṣu teṣu kāritāḥ saptaratnamayāḥ stūpā dhṛtapūjita [buddha] śarīrāḥ |
SA20n1303:33: atha puna rlokamāgatā buddhā āmantritā mayādhyepitāḥ prāvartayandharmacakram |
SA20n1303:34: pūjitāścaivaṃ buddhānāṃ śatāni sahasrāṇi śatasahasrāṇi śatasahasrāṇi koṭayaśca |
SA20n1303:39: labdhā ca sarvānutpādā dharmakṣāntistadā labdhaṃ vyākaraṇam |
SA20n1303:41: paritrātānyaprameyasattvasahasrāṇi na tathāpi bhāṣitaṃ kiñcinna ca paritrātaḥ kaścit |
SA20n1303:42: lokamāgatena lokanāyakamuninā satsvapi śūnyadharmeṣu bhāṣitaṃ lekhitaṃ prakāśitaṃ |
SA20n1303:43: lokamāgatena lokanāyakamuninā satsvapi śūnyadharmeṣu bhāṣitaṃ lekhitaṃ prakāśitaṃ śikṣitamāmoditaṃ sarvaśca veditamācaritamapi ca na prakāśitaṃ nāpi veditaṃ na cāpyācaritam |
SA20n1303:44: evaṃ dharmāḥ svabhāvalakṣaṇena śūnyāḥ lekhanamapi śūnyam |
SA20n1303:49: bodhisattvaḥ saṃgṛhṇandaśa kuśalopāyavalasahasrāṇi sotsāho 'kusīdo puṇyaparipūrito labhate 'nuttarāṃ sanyaksambodhim ||
SA20n1303:50: 6 | nūnamasukaramacintyaṃ yaducyate dharmābhāve dharmābhāve dharmalakṣaṇaṃ prāptavyābhāve prāptidharmāḥ |
SA20n1303:56: śraddhayā paśyati caturāryasstyāni niruṇaddhi kleśān mithyādṭaṣṭisaṃyojanāni |
SA20n1303:60: śraddhayā carati caturo brahmacihārān ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ prāpnotyanuttārāṃ samyaksambodhimityucyate śraddhākṣāntiḥ ||
SA20n1303:61: 7 | sattvā anādimati jātimaraṇalakṣaṇe saktā na paśyanti dharmasvabhāvam |
SA20n1303:62: prathamaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ yadepa svakāyaḥ paṃcaskandhaḥ prajñāyate sattva iti |
SA20n1303:63: tanna nātmā na sattvaḥ tatkasyahetoḥ tatrātmā cedātmātmavaśas tiṣṭhet |
SA20n1303:71: bodhisattvaścaritvā śraddhākṣānti manvayakṣānti cāciraṃ purayatyanuttarāṃ dharmakṣāntim ||
